name: SWING! (Deliriny2020)
description:
Play Swing! The newest grappling game from Deliriny2020!

In this game you control a target, and when you hold a special button, you get pulled towards it!

*Instructions in game*

CREDIT TO LIM95 FOR GRAPHIC CHANGES!

lim95.itch.io

*FOLLOWER ALERT*

Thanks to coder123pro1 for the Follow!

Thanks to Theophania626 for the Follow!

Also check out Theophania626's game, 'Touchy Fishy' at:

https://uarrr.itch.io/touchyfishy

To be featured in the comment section, give me a follow!

*If you follow me I'll probably look to see if you have made any games* :)

*If you want me to play a game you made, it must be browser playable*

Comment down below what you think of this new game. 

Even go ahead and give me a review!

Be honest though. 

And don't give me a one star review that says something dumb, like "Beans"

Have a great day!

:D

-Deliriny2020
